name: Parsec
overview: A fun to play horizontally scrolling shoot'em-up game, with waves and power-ups, mini-boss and bossfights and everything you expect in a good SHMUP created by X-ample Architectures and published in Game On 1993/10. This game was dedicated as such: Memorial: In honor of Commander. The brave defender of the Parsec Planets and to Kenor of 688, may your snapshots always find their target. Somewhere in a distant galaxy in the year 4096, in the observatory of a strange race, a scientist realized that something dangerous will happen. Our world will soon collide with the Uridian planet and it is your task to mobilize the strike force to destroy it before that can happen.
